A3JGroups

Class GenericRole

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgroups.ReceiverAdapter
      • A3JGroups.GenericRole
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.jgroups.MembershipListener, org.jgroups.MessageListener, org.jgroups.Receiver

    public class GenericRole
extends org.jgroups.ReceiverAdapter
    A new instance of this class is created each time a node can not be joined in an immediate way to a group (due to a supervisor election). This object is capable of receiving message, and of participating to the supervisor election.
    Author:
    bett.marco88@gmail.com
